name: Mobility Ventures
overview:
Mobility Ventures Helps Entrepreneurs Succeed!

Mobility Ventures is a venture capital and advisory services firm, focusing on emerging companies in Wireless, Digital Media, Mobile Marketing, Location Based Services, Mobile Commerce, Mobile Health and Telecommunications industries.

Mobility Ventures is a selective hands-on firm, investing in category defining companies. With every investment and engagement, Mobility Ventures aims to make a difference to build enduring, significant institutions. Mobility Ventures invests primarily in early stage and breakthrough ventures that have the promise to create new market opportunities.

Mobility Ventures as an advisory firm works with companies to transform strategy into reality. Mobility Ventures helps companies develop market strategies, enter new markets, defend existing ones, improve performance and profitably invest resources.

milestones.description: Lothar Pauly Joins Mobility Ventures as Managing Partner-Europe
